title: The Ups and Downs of IPOs
description: There’s an acronym you’ve probably heard in the news a lot lately: IPO. With companies like Pinterest, Airbnb and UBER all considering going public this year, Kate and Luigi break down why these companies already have huge valuations, and whether rich people have an unfair advantage when it comes to investing.
author: uchicagopodcasts@gmail.com (Chicago Booth Review)
